title: Neon Dreams Game
long_description:
Neon Dreams is a fast-paced, cyberpunk-themed action game built in Unreal Engine 5. The project showcases advanced visual effects, including custom shaders for neon-lit environments and complex particle systems for atmospheric effects and combat visuals.

The core gameplay loop was developed using Unreal's Blueprint system for rapid prototyping, with critical performance-intensive components rewritten in C++ for optimization. The game is designed to be highly scalable, running smoothly on a wide range of hardware configurations.

title: EcoTracker Dashboard
long_description:
EcoTracker is a powerful data visualization dashboard designed to display real-time environmental data from multiple public APIs. Built with React and D3.js, it offers a highly interactive and intuitive user experience.

Users can explore data through dynamic charts, maps, and customizable filters, allowing for in-depth analysis of environmental trends. The Node.js backend aggregates and caches data from various sources to ensure high performance and reliability.

title: API Gateway
long_description:
This project implements a high-performance, scalable API gateway using Node.js and Express. It serves as the single entry point for a microservices-based architecture, providing robust features like authentication, rate limiting, and request/response transformation.

The gateway is designed for minimal latency and high availability, making it suitable for production environments. It simplifies the client-side code by orchestrating multiple backend services and presenting a unified API.

title: Portfolio Website
long_description:
This personal portfolio website was built from the ground up using semantic HTML, modern CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. The goal was to create a lightweight, high-performance, and fully accessible site that showcases my skills and projects.

It features a clean, responsive design, smooth animations, and a functional contact form. The project demonstrates a strong understanding of frontend fundamentals and a commitment to creating a positive user experience.
